description:
Did you know that the best way to engage your prospective clients and customers is through video? If you are an author, expert, coach, entrepreneur or small business owner, you can't afford NOT to have a video presence. In fact, video is one of the easiest and most powerful marketing tools that you can use to build your brand and business. But, the challenge is how to convert viewers into customers.

The best part isâ€¦ I'm going to show you HOW in 5 simple steps!!!

In the next five videos, I will show you exactly HOW to create a YouTube Channel and the steps you need to turn your videos into customer generating machines.
title: Turn Your Videos into Marketing Machines!
